sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { useEffect, useLayoutEffect } from "react"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { getVideogameDetail, limpiarDetails } from "../../store/actions"; import styles from "./VideogameDetail.module.css" import SearchBar from "../SearchBar/index"; import Loading from "../Loading/index.js" const VideogameDetail = (props) => { const url_id = props.match.params.id; const details = useSelector(state => state.gameDetail) const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(()=> dispatch(getVideogameDetail(url_id)), [] ) useLayoutEffect(() => dispatch(limpiarDetails()), []) const {description, genres, image, name, platforms, rating, released } = details; return (
{!details? :
{/* Cabecera*/}

Videogames!

{/* Container Imagen + Datos*/}

Title:

{name}

Released:

{released}

Genres:

{genres && genres.map((genre)=> {genre} )}

Platforms:

{platforms && platforms.map((platform)=> {platform} )}

Rating:

{rating}
{/* Container descripci√≥n*/}

Description:

{description}

}
); } export default VideogameDetail;
